channel.title: Wilderness Skull Problems
channel.description: Hey everyone. Thanks for reading this. I am running an Allstar Source, 317. When in my pkbox or in the wild, when someone attacks another player, they do not skull. How can i fix this? Please help me. Skype: modcodygodex NO TeamView Thank you.

item.title: Wilderness Skull Problems
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

Search for the boolean that declarese if the player has attacked, and if it’s set to true make the “skullIcon” set to true

Read full topic

item.title: Wilderness Skull Problems
